casebody.data:
OSCAR NELSON, PETITIONER, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45931] [107 C. Cls. 477;

331 U. S. —]

Income tax; recognition of gain or loss; plan of liquidation as “reorganization” under section 203, Act of 1926. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court June 16, 1947.
